---
title: "TP53 HIST1H3B,H3F3A,HIST1H3C alterations in cohort"
output: html_notebook

params:
  cohort_label_file:
    label: "Cohort specific annotation file"
    value: pbta-histologies.tsv
    input: file
  telomere_ratio:
    label: "Telomere ratio file from merging control_summary.tsv and tumor_summary.tsv"
    value: telomere_940_ratio.tsv
    input: file  
  merge_dna_alt_ATRX:
    label: "Merged files for ATRX alterations"
    value: ../output/PutativeDriver_ATRX_DNA_alt.tsv
    input: file 
  merge_dna_alt_TERT:
    label: "Merged files for TERT alterations"
    value: ../output/PutativeDriver_TERT_DNA_alt.tsv
    input: file
  merge_dna_alt_DAXX:
    label: "Merged files for DAXX alterations"
    value: ../output/PutativeDriver_DAXX_DNA_alt.tsv
    input: file 
  merge_rna_alt:
    label: "Merged FPKM and fusion list"
    value: ../output/PutativeDriver_ATRTX_DAXX_TERT_RNA_alt.tsv
    input: file   

---

```{r echo=FALSE,message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
set.seed(12345)

root_dir <- rprojroot::find_root(rprojroot::has_dir(".git"))

library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
# install.packages("openxlsx", dependencies = TRUE)
library("openxlsx")

# soft linked to v17
# histology
cohort_plot_labels <- read_tsv(file.path(root_dir,"data",params$cohort_label_file))
# telomere ratio
telomere_ratio <- read_tsv(file.path(root_dir,"data",params$telomere_ratio))
# DAXX alterations
merge_dna_alt_DAXX <- read_tsv(file.path(params$merge_dna_alt_DAXX))
# ATRX alterations
merge_dna_alt_ATRX <- read_tsv(file.path(params$merge_dna_alt_ATRX))
# TERT alterations
merge_dna_alt_TERT <- read_tsv(file.path(params$merge_dna_alt_TERT))
# ccircle from Dr. Cole
ccircle <- readWorkbook("~/Documents/Cole_HCC/telomere_maintenance/Copy of pHGG_CCA_061318.xlsx") %>%
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(Research.ID)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(ID=paste0(gsub("[]]","",gsub("-TISS [[]","-T-",ID)),".WGS")) %>%
  left_join(cohort_plot_labels,by= c("ID"="parent_aliquot_id"))

# Terra from 
terra_stranded <- read_tsv(file.path(root_dir,"data","TelomeraseScores_PTBAStranded_FPKM.txt"))
terra_polya <- read_tsv(file.path(root_dir,"data","TelomeraseScores_PTBAPolya_FPKM.txt"))
terra <- rbind(terra_polya,terra_stranded)

merged_rna_ATRX_DAXX_TERT <- read_tsv(file.path(params$merge_rna_alt))

merged_rna_ATRX <- merged_rna_ATRX_DAXX_TERT %>%
  dplyr::rename(ATRX_fusion = FusionName) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(ATRX_fusion = case_when(grepl("ATRX",ATRX_fusion) ~ ATRX_fusion,
                                        TRUE ~ NA_character_ )) %>%
  dplyr::select("Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID","Kids_First_Participant_ID",
                "sample_id","parent_aliquot_id",
                "ATRX_fusion","ATRX_fpkm")

merged_rna_DAXX <- merged_rna_ATRX_DAXX_TERT %>%
  dplyr::rename(DAXX_fusion = FusionName) %>%
  dplyr::mutate( DAXX_fusion = case_when(grepl("DAXX",DAXX_fusion) ~ DAXX_fusion,
                                         TRUE ~ NA_character_ )) %>%
  dplyr::select("Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID","Kids_First_Participant_ID",
                "sample_id","parent_aliquot_id",
                "DAXX_fusion","DAXX_fpkm")

merged_rna_TERT <- merged_rna_ATRX_DAXX_TERT %>%
  dplyr::mutate(TERT_fusion = FusionName) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(TERT_fusion = case_when(grepl("TERT",TERT_fusion) ~TERT_fusion,
                                        TRUE ~ NA_character_ )) %>%
  dplyr::select("Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID","Kids_First_Participant_ID",
                "sample_id","parent_aliquot_id",
                "TERT_fusion","TERT_fpkm")


```


```{r}

format_ATRX <- merge_dna_alt_ATRX %>%
  left_join(merged_rna_ATRX,suffix=c("_DNA","_RNA"),by=c("Kids_First_Participant_ID","sample_id")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(gsub("[.].*$","",parent_aliquot_id_DNA)==gsub("[.].*$","",parent_aliquot_id_RNA)) %>%
  dplyr::select("Kids_First_Participant_ID","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_RNA",everything()) %>%
  dplyr::select(-Hugo_Symbol) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate("alterations_ATRX"=case_when(
    !is.na(ATRX_MOD_HIGH_mut_consensus) | !is.na(ATRX_loss_consensus) ~ "ATRX_loss",
           !is.na(ATRX_gain_consensus)  ~ "ATRX_gain",
    TRUE ~ ""
  ))
  


```


```{r}

format_DAXX <- merge_dna_alt_DAXX %>%
  left_join(merged_rna_DAXX,suffix=c("_DNA","_RNA"),by=c("Kids_First_Participant_ID","sample_id")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(gsub("[.].*$","",parent_aliquot_id_DNA)==gsub("[.].*$","",parent_aliquot_id_RNA)) %>%
  dplyr::select("Kids_First_Participant_ID","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_RNA",everything()) %>%
  dplyr::select(-Hugo_Symbol)  %>% 
  dplyr::mutate("alterations_DAXX"=case_when(
      !is.na(DAXX_loss_consensus) ~ "DAXX_loss",
       !is.na(DAXX_gain_consensus) ~ "DAXX_gain",
      TRUE ~ ""
  ))


```


```{r}

format_TERT <- merge_dna_alt_TERT %>%
  left_join(merged_rna_TERT,suffix=c("_DNA","_RNA"),by=c("Kids_First_Participant_ID","sample_id")) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(gsub("[.].*$","",parent_aliquot_id_DNA)==gsub("[.].*$","",parent_aliquot_id_RNA)) %>%
  dplyr::select("Kids_First_Participant_ID","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_RNA",everything()) %>%
  dplyr::select(-Hugo_Symbol) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate("alterations_TERT"=case_when(
    !is.na(TERT_MOD_HIGH_mut_consensus) | !is.na(TERT_upstream_mut_consensus) |
      !is.na(TERT_amplification_consensus) | !is.na(TERT_gain_consensus) |
      !is.na(TERT_loss_consensus) ~ "TERT_mod",
    TRUE ~ ""
  ))
  


```

```{r}
all_alterations <- full_join(format_ATRX,
                             format_DAXX,
                             by=c("Kids_First_Participant_ID",
                                  "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA",
                                  "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_RNA",
                                  "parent_aliquot_id_DNA",
                                  "parent_aliquot_id_RNA",
                                  "sample_id")) %>%
  full_join(format_TERT,by=c("Kids_First_Participant_ID",
                             "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA",
                             "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_RNA",
                             "parent_aliquot_id_DNA",
                             "parent_aliquot_id_RNA",
                             "sample_id"))
all_alterations[all_alterations == 0] <- NA

all_alterations <- all_alterations %>% 
  dplyr::mutate("defining_alt" = paste(alterations_TERT,alterations_DAXX,alterations_ATRX)) %>%
  dplyr::mutate("defining_alt" = if_else(defining_alt== "  ","no SNV/CNV alt",defining_alt))

```


```{r}
all_alterations_ratio <- all_alterations %>%
  left_join(telomere_ratio,by = c("Kids_First_Participant_ID",
                                "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA" = "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_tumor")) %>%
  dplyr::select("Kids_First_Participant_ID","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA",
                "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_RNA","sample_id", ends_with("fpkm"),ends_with("fusion"),ends_with("consensus"),ends_with("manta"),"ratio","defining_alt" ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(ratio = log2(ratio)) %>%
  left_join(terra,by = c("Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_RNA" = "SampleID")) %>%
  left_join(ccircle[,c("CCA.Dot.Blot","Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID")],by = c("Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID_DNA" = "Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID")) %>%
  write_tsv(file.path("../output/all_alterations_ATRX_DAXX_TERT.tsv"))
```


```{r}

count_alt<-all_alterations_ratio %>% dplyr::group_by(defining_alt) %>% tally() %>% dplyr::mutate("count_alt"=paste0(defining_alt,"(",n,")"))

all_alterations_ratio <- all_alterations_ratio %>% left_join(count_alt)

ggplot(all_alterations_ratio,aes(x=count_alt,y=ratio))+geom_boxplot()+theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))+ ggsave(filename = "../plots/all_alterations_ATRX_DAXX_TERT.png")
```
